to heave things higher, and 
to let the wind fill yer sails!
helpWindow.orPunchingSomethingText: Or give it a good wallop, toss it overboard, and blast it to smithereens with a sticky bomb as it falls to Davy Jones' Locker.
helpWindow.pickUpInfoText:
- Plunder -
Grab flags, enemies, or anything 
not nailed down to the deck. 
Press again to toss it overboard!
helpWindow.powerupBombDescriptionText:
Lets ye wield three bombs 
in a row instead of just one, me heartie!
helpWindow.powerupCurseDescriptionText:
Ye probably want to steer clear o' these.
...or do ye?
helpWindow.powerupHealthDescriptionText:
Brings ye back from Davy Jones' Locker, with nary a scratch. 
Ye'd never have reckoned it, but 'tis true, me heartie!
helpWindow.powerupIceBombsDescriptionText:
Be weaker than yer typical bomb, 
but leave yer enemies frozen solid 
and as brittle as an old piece o' hardtack.
helpWindow.powerupImpactBombsDescriptionText:
Be a tad weaker than yer standard bombs, 
but they burst on impact with a mighty bang.
helpWindow.powerupPunchDescriptionText:
Gives ye fists more oomph, 
speed, and power, me hearties!
helpWindow.powerupShieldDescriptionText:
Takes a lickin' for ye, me hearty, 
so ye don't have to!
helpWindow.powerupStickyBombsDescriptionText:
Stick to anythin' they hit.
Mirth ensues.
helpWindow.powerupsSubtitleText: Aye, no game worth its salt be complete without booty to plunder!
helpWindow.punchInfoText:
- Punch -
Punches do more damage th'
faster yer fists be movin', so
run and spin like a madlad.
helpWindow.runInfoText:
- Sail -
Grasp ANY swashbucklin' button to set yer boots in motion. Triggers or shoulder buttons be fine choices if ye possess 'em.
Sailing be a swift course to reach yer destinations, yet be wary o' treacherous cliffs, for turning be a mighty challenge.
helpWindow.someDaysText: Arrr, some days yer just feelin' like punchin' somethin'. Or blowin' somethin' up to smithereens, me hearty.
helpWindow.toGetTheMostText: Ye'll need the right tools to plunder the depths of this game, me hearty:
helpWindow.welcomeText: Ahoy and welcome aboard the good ship ${APP_NAME}!

ps3ControllersWindow.macInstructionsText:
Arrr, Switch off the power on the back of yer PS3, 
then make sure yer Bluetooth be enabled on yer Mac. 
Then, connect yer controller to yer Mac via a USB cable to pair the two. 
From then on, ye can use the controller's home button to connect it to yer Mac in either wired (USB) 
or wireless (Bluetooth) mode.


On some Macs, ye may be prompted for a passcode when pairing. 
If this happens, see the followin' tutorial or google for help.



PS3 controllers connected wirelessly should show up in the device list in System Preferences->Bluetooth. 
Ye may need to remove them from that list when ye want to use them with yer PS3 again.


Also, make sure to disconnect them from Bluetooth when not in use, 
or their batteries will continue to drain.

Bluetooth should handle up to 7 connected devices, 
though yer mileage may vary.
ps3ControllersWindow.ouyaInstructionsText:
to use yer damn ps3 thingamajig with ya dead console, just connect it with a USB cable
for once to make em fall in love. Doin' this may disconnect other thingamajigs, so
yarr should then kill the dead thing and unplug the USB cable.

After that the thingamajig's HOME button makes a mythical connection
to yer ship. When yerr done sailin', SMASH that HOME button for 10 hours
to kill the thingimajig; otherwise it will need the men to work harder
on the head.

storeDescriptionText:
8 Player Party Game Madness!

Blast yer hearties (or the computer) in a tourney of explosive mini-games like Steal-the-Booty, Bomber-Ice-Battley, and Epic-Slow-Motion-Swashbuckle!

Easy controls and broad controller support make it a breeze for up to 8 folks to get in on the action; ye can even use yer mobile devices as controllers via the free 'BombSquad Remote' app!

Gunpowder be at yer ship!

Visit www.froemling.net/bombsquad for more info.

statements.${TEAM} is disqualified because ${PLAYER: ${TEAM} be walkin' the plank 'cause ${PLAYER} abandoned ship
statements.Killing ${NAME} for skipping part of the: Slayin' ${NAME} for skippin' part o' the course!

tips.A perfectly timed running-jumping-spin-p:
A perfectly timed running-jumping-spin-punch can send a scallywag to 
Davy Jones' locker in a single blow and earn ye lifelong respect from yer mates.
Always be rememberin' to keep yer teeth shipshape, matey! Aye, and don't forget to floss!
tips.Create player profiles for yourself and:
Craft player pirates for ye and yer mates with 
yer preferred names and looks, instead of relyin' on random ones.
tips.Curse boxes turn you into a ticking time:
Curse boxes turn ye into a ticking time bomb, matey. 
The only cure be to swiftly snatch a health-pack afore ye blow
tips.Despite their looks, all characters' abi:
Despite their appearances, all characters be possessin' the same abilities. 
So choose the one that resembles ye the most!
tips.Don't get too cocky with that energy shi: Don't be too cocksure with that energy shield, matey. Ye can still find yerself hurled off a cliff if ye ain't careful!
tips.Don't run all the time. Really. You wi: Don't be sprintin' all the time, matey. Mark me words, ye'll find yerself overboard off cliffs if ye don't ease up!
tips.Don't spin for too long; you'll become d: Don't be spinning for too long, lest ye become dizzy and keel over like a drunken sailor!
tips.Hold any button to run. (Trigger button: Clutch any button to break into a run. (The trigger buttons be fine choices if ye have 'em aboard)
tips.Hold down any button to run. You'll get:
Clutch any button to break into a run. Ye'll cover ground quicker, but beware, 
ye won't be turning on a dime, so keep a weather eye out for cliffs ahead!
tips.Ice bombs are not very powerful, but the:
Ice gunpowder may not pack much punch, but they freeze 
the soul of whoever they strike, leaving 'em vulnerable to shattering.
tips.If someone picks you up, punch them and:
If a scallywag grabs ye, give 'em a good punch and they'll likely drop ye. 
Works just as well on land as it does at sea!
tips.If you are short on controllers, install:
If ye find yerself short on controllers, hoist the '${REMOTE_APP_NAME}' app onto yer mobile devices, 
and ye can steer yer ship with 'em just like a proper captain!
tips.If you get a sticky-bomb stuck to you, j:
If ye find yerself stuck with a sticky-bomb, jump like a bilge rat and spin like a whirlpool. 
Ye might just shake the blasted thing loose, or at least make a grand show of yer final moments!
tips.If you kill an enemy in one hit you get: If ye send a foe to Davy Jones' locker in a single blow, ye'll be haulin' in double the booty for yer trouble.
tips.If you pick up a curse, your only hope f:
If ye be cursed by ill fate, yer only chance for survival be to spy out 
a health powerup in the next few ticks o' the clock.
If ye be stayin' anchored in one spot, ye'll be meetin' Davy Jones soon enough! Run and weave to keep the sharks at bay and yer ship afloat
tips.If you've got lots of players coming and:
If ye be havin' a swarm o' sailors joinin' and departin' yer ship, be sure to hoist the 'auto-kick-idle-players' flag 
in yer settings, lest any scallywag forgets to walk the plank
tips.If your device gets too warm or you'd li:

Turn down the graphicky stuff.
tips.If your framerate is choppy, try turning:
Yarr ship is too slow?
If so then trry turnin the graphicky stuff down!

wiimoteSetupWindow.macInstructionsText:
Make sure your Wee is off and Goldtooth is enabled
on yer Mac, then prress 'Listen'. Weemote support can
be a bit yanky, so yer may have to trry a few times
before yer get a connection.

Goldtooth should handle up to 7 pirates,
though yer mileage may varry.

BombSquad supports the original Weemotes, Nunchuks,
and the Classic Controllerr.
The newer Wee Remote Plus now works too
but not with luggage.

For making this possible. Arrr!!!
